channel.title: Help rep++ [pi] rep++
channel.description:
hey so i have been adding zombiecaves to sacred pk and i have added but the only thing that is wrong is when you click the npc you talk to him and you click okay lets go he dont teleport you into the minigame
this is the code i put into clicking buttons
case 2830://zombiecaves c.teleportToX = 2604; c.teleportToY = 9903; ZombieCaves.spawnNextZombies(c); break;
[b]and this is the error i get[/b] src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:450: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ZombieCaves location: class server.model.players.packets.ClickingButtons ZombieCaves.spawnNextZombies(c); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
if you know how to fix just edit my code and post the fix below

item.title: Help rep++ [pi] rep++
item.dc:creator: @liamp liamp
item.description:
@liamp wrote:

[quote=“wildskiller, post:3, topic:431000”]Do you know how to read a compiler?
ZombieCaves isn’t declared[/quote]

lol

Read full topic

item.title: Help rep++ [pi] rep++
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

if you put the ZombieCaves code into client.java put c.ZombieCaves. but make sure its declared at the top.

Read full topic

item.title: Help rep++ [pi] rep++
item.dc:creator: @liamp liamp
item.description:
@liamp wrote:

hey so i have been adding zombiecaves to sacred pk and i have added but the only thing that is wrong is when you click the npc you talk to him and you click okay lets go he dont teleport you into the minigame

this is the code i put into clicking buttons

case 2830://zombiecaves
c.teleportToX = 2604;
c.teleportToY = 9903;
ZombieCaves.spawnNextZombies©;
break;

and this is the error i get
src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:450: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable ZombieCaves
location: class server.model.players.packets.ClickingButtons
ZombieCaves.spawnNextZombies©;
^
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.

Press any key to continue . . .
